short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a convenient widget to Amazon product pages, enabling seamless switching between various regional storefronts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a convenient widget to the top of Amazon product pages, enabling seamless switching between various regional storefronts. Additionally, it includes a search button for unavailable items, searching by Item Model Number, part number, or product title, prioritizing availability in that order.
